testcase.classname: Browse button on Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating the Browse button visibility
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page................passed Then User should see a button with name browse "Browse" on the page.........passed

testcase.classname: Browse button on Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating the Browse button tool tip option
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page................passed Then User should see a tool tip "PDF files only" for the Browse button......passed

testcase.classname: Browse button on Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating the Browse button operation
testcase.system-out: Given User is on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page..................passed When User clicks the Browse button and selects a document...................passed Then User should see the selected document in the field next to the Browse button on the page.passed

testcase.classname: Generate Menu Button on Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating the Generate Menu button visibility
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page................passed Then User should see a button with text "GENERATE MENU" at the bottom of the page.passed

testcase.classname: Generate Menu Button on Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating the Generate Menu button operation
testcase.system-out: Given User is on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page..................passed When User clicks the GENERATE MENU button...................................passed Then New Diet plan should be generated with the latest confirmed Health conditions.passed

testcase.classname: Generate Menu Button on Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating the Generate Menu button operation 2
testcase.system-out: Given User is on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page..................passed When User clicks the GENERATE MENU button...................................passed Then User should land on "View Recent Diets" page...........................passed

testcase.name: Validating the heading
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page................passed Then User sees the heading "Confirm Health Conditions and Generate a new Diet Plan" on the page.passed

testcase.classname: Option 1 to confirm Health Conditionson Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating option1 menu visibility
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page................passed Then User should see option1 menu to update the health conditions...........passed

testcase.classname: Option 1 to confirm Health Conditionson Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating visibility of Confirm button on option 1 menu
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page................passed Then User should see a button with text " CONFIRM" in option1 menu..........passed

testcase.classname: Option 1 to confirm Health Conditionson Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating the option1 menu interaction
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page................passed Then User can update the health conditions in option1 menu..................passed

testcase.classname: Option 1 to confirm Health Conditionson Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating that the option1 menu cannot be modified after confirming
testcase.system-out: Given User is on "Create Plan" page.........................................passed When User clicks the CONFIRM button in option1 menu.........................passed Then User cannot update the health conditions in option1 menu...............passed

testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page................passed Then User should see option2 menu to update the health conditions...........passed

testcase.name: Validating visibility of Confirm button on option2 menu
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page................passed Then User should see a button with text "CONFIRM" in option2 menu...........passed

testcase.classname: Option 2 to confirm Health Conditionson Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating the option 2 menu interaction
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page................passed Then User can update the health conditions in option2 menu..................passed

testcase.classname: Upload button on Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating the Upload button
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page................passed Then User should see a button with name upload "Upload" on the page.........passed

testcase.classname: Upload button on Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating the Upload button operation
testcase.system-out: Given User is on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page..................passed When User clicks upload button..............................................passed Then User should be able to upload file.....................................passed

testcase.classname: Upload button on Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating the Upload button with no file selected
testcase.system-out: Given User is on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page..................passed When User clicks the Upload button without selecting a document.............passed Then User should see an error message "Only files with extension .pdf are allowed".passed

testcase.classname: Upload button on Create Plan page
testcase.name: Validating the Upload functionality with correct file format and size
testcase.system-out: Given User is on "Confirm conditions and Create Plan" page..................passed When User clicks the Upload button by selecting a pdf file of size less than 2MB.passed Then User should see a message "File uploaded succesfully"..................passed

testcase.name: Verifying breadcrumbs in the page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home page "Home" after login...............................passed When User clicks on My Patients tab.........................................passed Then page displays breadcrumbs as Dietician Softaware-My Patients...........passed

testcase.name: Validating the My patients page title
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home page "Home" after login...............................passed When User clicks on My Patients tab.........................................passed Then page title is displayed as "My Patients"...............................passed

testcase.name: Verifying the search button feature
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home page "Home" after login...............................passed When User clicks on My Patients tab.........................................passed Then search button is displayed as "Search".................................passed

testcase.name: Verifying the textbox feature
testcase.system-out: Given User is on home page "Home" after login...............................passed When User clicks on My Patients tab.........................................passed Then Name, email and phone number filters are displayed.....................passed

testcase.name: Verify View PDF action
testcase.system-out: Given User is on View Patient Test Reports page.............................passed When User clicks on View PDF button.........................................passed Then PDF is opened in proper readable format................................passed

testcase.name: Verify contents of PDF file
testcase.system-out: Given User has clicked view PDF button......................................passed When User is on PDF file....................................................passed Then Patient details is displayed in PDF....................................passed

testcase.name: Verify contents of PDF file 2
testcase.system-out: Given User has clicked view PDF button......................................passed When User is on PDF file....................................................passed Then Doctor details is displayed in PDF.....................................passed

testcase.name: Verify contents of PDF file 3
testcase.system-out: Given User has clicked view PDF button......................................passed When User is on PDF file....................................................passed Then PDF displays list of conditions, preferences list, Co-morbidites.......passed

testcase.name: Verify contents of PDF file 4
testcase.system-out: Given User has clicked view PDF button......................................passed When User is on PDF file....................................................passed Then PDF displays diet menu for seven days, any warning and comments mentioned by doctor.passed

testcase.name: Verify each patient has cutomer ID
testcase.system-out: Given User has hit search button............................................passed When Patients record is displayed...........................................passed Then Each patient "cust ID" is be displayed.................................passed

testcase.name: Verify each patient has Name
testcase.system-out: Given User has hit search button............................................passed When Patients record is displayed...........................................passed Then Each patient "Name" is dispalyed.......................................passed

testcase.name: Verify each patient has Details
testcase.system-out: Given User has hit search button............................................passed When Patients record is displayed...........................................passed Then Each patient "email", "phone number" and "location" is dispalyed.......passed

testcase.name: Verify view patients previuos test reports action button
testcase.system-out: Given User has hit search button............................................passed When User clicks on View Previous Test Reports button.......................passed Then User is redirected to View Previous Test Reports "page"................passed

testcase.name: Verify view patients previuos diet plans action button
testcase.system-out: Given User has hit search button............................................passed When User clicks on View Previous Diet Plans button.........................passed Then User is redirected to Generated Diet Plans "page"......................passed

testcase.name: Verify create new report or plan action button
testcase.system-out: Given User has hit search button............................................passed When User clicks on Create New Report or Plan button........................passed Then User is redirected to Confirm Health Conditions and Generate a New Diet plan "page".passed

testcase.classname: Verify View Previuos Test Reports Page
testcase.name: Verify breadcrumbs on test report page
testcase.system-out: Given User clicks on button View Previous Test Reports......................passed When User is on View Patient Test Reports page..............................passed Then page displays breadcrumbs as Dietician Softaware- View Recent Test Reports.passed

testcase.classname: Verify View Previuos Test Reports Page
testcase.name: Verify page title
testcase.system-out: Given User clicks on button View Previous Test Reports......................passed When User is on View Patient Test Reports page..............................passed Then Title is displayed as "title" View Patient Test Reports................passed

testcase.classname: Verify View Previuos Test Reports Page
testcase.name: Verify primary information of a user
testcase.system-out: Given User clicks on button View Previous Test Reports......................passed When User is on View Patient Test Reports page..............................passed Then Page displays primary information like patient Id number, name, email address, Phone number, Address.passed

testcase.classname: Verify View Previuos Test Reports Page
testcase.name: Verify table headers
testcase.system-out: Given User clicks on button View Previous Test Reports......................passed When User is on View Patient Test Reports page..............................passed Then Table displays column heading as Record number, Doc-ID, File Uploaded time, File/Report name, Identified health conditions.passed

testcase.classname: Verify View Previuos Test Reports Page
testcase.name: Verify table contents
testcase.system-out: Given User clicks on button View Previous Test Reports......................passed When User is on View Patient Test Reports page..............................passed Then Table content displays document number, view PDF, uploaded time, file name, health condition of each patient.passed

testcase.classname: Verify View Previuos Test Reports Page
testcase.name: Verify Signout button
testcase.system-out: Given User clicks on button View Previous Test Reports......................passed When User is on View Patient Test Reports page..............................passed Then Signout button is displayed in the page as "SIGNOUT"...................passed

testcase.classname: Verify View Previuos Test Reports Page
testcase.name: Verify pagination
testcase.system-out: Given User clicks on button View Previous Test Reports......................passed When User is on View Patient Test Reports page..............................passed Then only three records displayed in one page...............................passed

testcase.classname: Verify View Previuos Test Reports Page
testcase.name: Verify pagination navigation
testcase.system-out: Given User clicks on button View Previous Test Reports......................passed When User is on View Patient Test Reports page..............................passed Then Number of pages containing each three records is displayed.............passed

testcase.name: Verifying search patients option
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User clicks search button without entering details.....................passed Then Records of all users are displayed.....................................passed

testcase.name: Verifying search patients option by name filter
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User enters valid "name" in name filter box............................passed Then Records of requested user is displayed.................................passed

testcase.name: Verifying search patients option by email filter
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User enters valid "email address" in email filter box..................passed Then Records of requested user is displayed.................................passed

testcase.name: Verifying search patients option by phone number filter
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User enters valid "phone number" in phone number filter box............passed Then Records of requested user is displayed.................................passed

testcase.name: Verifying search patients option by name and phone number filter
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User enters valid "name" with valid "phone number" in name and phone number filter boxes.passed Then Records of requested user is displayed.................................passed

testcase.name: Verifying search patients option by name and email filter
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User enters valid "name" with valid "email address" in name and email filter boxes.passed Then Records of requested user is displayed.................................passed

testcase.name: Verifying search patients option by email and phone number filter
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User enters valid "email address" with valid "phone number" in email and phone number filter boxes.passed Then Records of requested user is displayed.................................passed

testcase.name: Verifying search patients options by entering invalid phone number
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User enters invalid phone number from "invalidphone" and 0 in phone number filter box.passed Then Error message "Invalid input" is displayed.............................passed

testcase.name: Verifying search patients options by entering invalid email address
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User enters invalid email address from "invalidemail" and 0 in email filter box.passed Then Error message "Invalid input" is displayed.............................passed

testcase.name: Verifying search patients options by entering invalid name
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User enters invalid name from "invalidname" and 0 in name filter box...passed Then Error message "Invalid input" is displayed.............................passed

testcase.name: Verifying table header displayed
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User clicks search button with or without entering details.............passed Then Table header should display number of items found......................passed

testcase.name: Verifying column name in patients data table
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User clicks search button with or without entering details.............passed Then Patient data table displays columns name Record Number, Cust ID, Name, Details, Last Visit and Actions.passed

testcase.name: Verifying action column buttons
testcase.system-out: Given User is on my patients page...........................................passed When User clicks search button with or without entering details.............passed Then Action column displays View Previous Test Report, View Previous Diet Plans, Create New Report or Plan buttons.passed

testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "View Recent Diets" diet page............................passed Then User should see the heading "Generated Diet Plans" on the page.........passed

testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "View Recent Diets" diet page............................passed Then User should see that Diet Plans tab on the menu bar is visible.........passed

testcase.classname: View PDF on Diets Plans page

testcase.system-out: Given User is logged on to Dietician website "https://DieticianWebsite.com".passed When User lands on "View Recent Diets" diet page............................passed Then View record number, planID, customer details,plangenerated time, comments available for the generated diet plans.passed
